inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: urine sample provided prior to biopsy

exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: no history of invasive treatment for BPH within 3-6 months

notes: Patient has lower urinary tract symptoms, including frequency, urgency, weak stream, incomplete emptying and intermittent flow for the past 9 months. Further evaluation revealed IPSS score : 15, Post-void residual: 70 mL, Prostate volume (TRUS): 60 mL, Prostate-specific antigen (PSA) level: 3.2 ng/mL.
